properties.description: Integration Runtime created in the same region as File Storage

activities.name: SP-InitiateLog
activities.description: Initiate the start of the Pipeline.

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: Get the metadata for the current object from the SQL Table UTIL.DataLoadMetadata. The metadata should have all information required to load the object.

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM UTIL.[vDataLoadMetaData_FromTable_ToTable] WHERE SourceSystem = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceSystem}' AND SourceSchema = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}' AND SourceTable = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}'

activities.name: SP-FinishLog
activities.description: Initiate the end of the Pipeline

activities.name: IF-CopyData
activities.description: Copy data from Source to Sink if the Extraction Flag is true

activities.name: IF-SPTransformData
activities.description: Check if the Extraction Flag is true and a Stored Procedure name is specified for transformation post data load

activities.name: IF-LastExtractionUpdate
activities.description: Update the metadata with LastExtraction Value

activities.name: IF-SourceSQL
activities.description: Update the Source SQL in the variable. If Incremental Load then update the Last Extraction Value in the SQL

ifTrueActivities.name: SET-LastExtractionVal
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the Incremental Load Value to be used in Source SQL later

ifTrueActivities.name: SET-SourceSQL-Incremental
ifTrueActivities.description: Update the Source SQL with the Incremental Load value

activities.name: IF-IncrementalLoad
activities.description: If the current object is Incremental Load, then get the current timestamp and counter from the Source Database

ifTrueActivities.name: LU-GetCurrentExtractionVal
ifTrueActivities.description: Get the Last Extraction Values from the Source Database

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT GETDATE() AS LastDateTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(bigint, @@DBTS)) AS LastTSCounter

ifTrueActivities.name: SET-LastExtractionCounter
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the value for Last Extraction Counter. If Timestamp or actual column.

activities.name: SP-InitiateLog
activities.description: Initiate the start of the Pipeline.

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: Get the metadata for the current object from the SQL Table UTIL.DataLoadMetadata. The metadata should have all information required to load the object.

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM UTIL.vDataLoadMetaData_FromTable_ToFile WHERE TargetSystem = 'ADLS' AND SourceSystem = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceSystem}' AND SourceSchema = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceSchema}' AND SourceTable = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceTable}'

activities.name: SP-FinishLog
activities.description: Initiate the end of the Pipeline

activities.name: IF-CopyData
activities.description: Copy data from Source to Sink if the Extraction Flag is true

activities.name: IF-LastExtractionUpdate
activities.description: Update the metadata with LastExtraction Value

activities.name: IF-SourceSQL
activities.description: Update the Source SQL in the variable. If Incremental Load then update the Last Extraction Value in the SQL

ifTrueActivities.name: SET-LastExtractionVal
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the Incremental Load Value to be used in Source SQL later

ifTrueActivities.name: SET-SourceSQL-Incremental
ifTrueActivities.description: Update the Source SQL with the Incremental Load value

activities.name: IF-IncrementalLoad
activities.description: If the current object is Incremental Load, then get the current timestamp and counter from the Source Database

ifTrueActivities.name: LU-GetCurrentExtractionVal
ifTrueActivities.description: Get the Last Extraction Values from the Source Database

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT GETDATE() AS LastDateTime, CONVERT(VARCHAR, CONVERT(bigint, @@DBTS)) AS LastTSCounter

ifTrueActivities.name: SET-LastExtractionCounter
ifTrueActivities.description: Set the value for Last Extraction Counter. If Timestamp or actual column.

activities.name: SP-InitiateLog
activities.description: Initiate the start of the Pipeline.

activities.name: LU-Metadata
activities.description: Get the metadata for the current object from the SQL Table UTIL.DataLoadMetadata. The metadata should have all information required to load the object.

sqlReaderQuery.value: SELECT * FROM UTIL.[vDataLoadMetaData_FromFile_ToTable] WHERE SourceSystem = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceSystem}' AND SourceFile = '@{pipeline().parameters.SourceFile}'

activities.name: SP-FinishLog
activities.description: Initiate the end of the Pipeline
